text: It began during a PYP workshop in Melbourne last week, where we used Ron Ritchhart’s 8 cultural forces as a lens to explore how we might create a culture of creativity.  As participants considered various images of learning spaces, their own and others’, including some beautiful, inviting Reggio environments we generated a list of questions, such as these:

Thanks again for a great read. This was helpful.I was wondering if there are any guidelines out there for setting up your PYP classroom.Also I’ve been out of the classroom for a while and heading back soon. Is it still good practice to display a wonder wall for children to post their wonderings and if so are these wonderings random or connected to the unit of inquiry at the time?Thanks so much for your feedback:)
